newsitem.title: USA: Corporate Express buys Canada stationer.
newsitem.headline: Corporate Express buys Canada stationer.

text.p: Corporate Express Inc, a supplier of office products and services to corporations, said on Wednesday had bought Canada's largest independent contract stationer, Boulevard Office Products in Montreal.
The company said in a statement the acquisition completed the main part of the distribution network in Canada for Corporate Express. Financial terms were not disclosed.

The company acquired 33 companies during the second quarter ended Aug 31, 1996 with current combined annual revenue of over $350 million, slightly above the $300 million acquired during the first quarter. Twenty-two acquisitions were in the United States and 11 were international.
